org.microbean.helm.maven

Class TestReleaseMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractHelmMojo
        • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractReleaseMojo
          • org.microbean.helm.maven.AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
            • org.microbean.helm.maven.TestReleaseMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="test")
public class TestReleaseMojo
extends AbstractSingleReleaseMojo
    Runs tests against a Helm release.
    Author:
    Laird Nelson

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        protected void execute(Callable<ReleaseManager> releaseManagerCallable)
                throws Exception
        Performs a release-oriented task using a ReleaseManager available from the supplied Callable.

        This implementation runs tests against a release.

        Specified by:
        execute in class AbstractReleaseMojo
        Parameters:
        releaseManagerCallable - the Callable that will provide a ReleaseManager; must not be null
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs

      • getCleanup

        public boolean getCleanup()
        Returns true if test Pods should be deleted after the tests complete.
        Returns:
        true if test Pods should be deleted after the tests complete; false otherwise
        See Also:
        setCleanup(boolean)

      • addReleaseTestListener

        public void addReleaseTestListener(ReleaseTestListener listener)
        Adds a ReleaseTestListener that will be notified when the tests complete.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ReleaseTestListener to add; may be null in which case no action will be taken
        See Also:

      • getReleaseTestListeners

        public ReleaseTestListener[] getReleaseTestListeners()
        Invokes the getReleaseTestListenersList() method and converts its return value to an array.

        This method never returns null.

        Overrides of this method must not return null.

        Returns:
        a non-null array of ReleaseTestListeners
        See Also:
        getReleaseTestListenersList()

      • getReleaseTestListenersList

        public List<ReleaseTestListener> getReleaseTestListenersList()
        Returns the List of ReleaseTestListeners whose elements will be notified when the tests complete.

        This method may return null.

        Overrides of this method are permitted to return null.

        Returns:
        a List of ReleaseTestListeners, or null
        See Also:
        setReleaseTestListenersList(List), addReleaseTestListener(ReleaseTestListener), removeReleaseTestListener(ReleaseTestListener)

      • setReleaseTestListenersList

        public void setReleaseTestListenersList(List<ReleaseTestListener> releaseTestListeners)
        Installs the List of ReleaseTestListeners whose elements will be notified when the tests complete.
        Parameters:
        releaseTestListeners - the List of ReleaseTestListeners whose elements will be notified when the tests complete; may be null
        See Also:
        getReleaseTestListenersList(), addReleaseTestListener(ReleaseTestListener), removeReleaseTestListener(ReleaseTestListener)
